bulk_set_partial_config_parameters.description: Allows for bulk setting partial parameters. Useful when multiple partial parameters have to be set at the same time.

parameter.description: The name (or ID) of the configuration parameter you want to configure.
parameter.name: Parameter

value.description: The new value(s) to set for this configuration parameter. Can either be a raw integer value to represent the bulk change or a mapping where the key is the bitmask (either in hex or integer form) and the value is the new value you want to set for that partial parameter.
value.name: Value

clear_lock_usercode.description: Clears a user code from a lock.

code_slot.description: Code slot to clear code from.
code_slot.name: Code slot

clear_lock_usercode.name: Clear lock user code

command_class.description: The ID of the command class that you want to issue a command to.
command_class.name: Command class

endpoint.description: The endpoint to call the API on. If an endpoint is specified, that endpoint will be targeted for all nodes associated with the target areas, devices, and/or entities. If an endpoint is not specified, the root endpoint (0) will be targeted for nodes associated with target areas and devices, and the endpoint for the primary value of each entity will be targeted.
endpoint.name: Endpoint

invoke_cc_api.name: Invoke a Command Class API on a node (advanced)

command_class.description: The ID of the command class for the value.
command_class.name: Command class

options.description: Set value options map. Refer to the Z-Wave JS documentation for more information on what options can be set.
options.name: Options

property.description: The ID of the property for the value.
property.name: Property

property_key.description: The ID of the property key for the value.
property_key.name: Property key

multicast_set_value.name: Set a value on multiple devices via multicast (advanced)

refresh_value.description: Force updates the values of a Z-Wave entity.
refresh_value.name: Refresh values

reset_meter.description: Resets the meters on a node.

meter_type.description: The type of meter to reset. Not all meters support the ability to pick a meter type to reset.
meter_type.name: Meter type

value.description: The value that meters should be reset to. Not all meters support the ability to be reset to a specific value.
value.name: Target value

reset_meter.name: Reset meters on a node

set_config_parameter.description: Changes the configuration parameters of your Z-Wave devices.

parameter.description: The name (or ID) of the configuration parameter you want to configure.
parameter.name: Parameter

value.description: The new value to set for this configuration parameter.
value.name: Value

set_config_parameter.name: Set device configuration parameter

set_lock_usercode.description: Sets a user code on a lock.

code_slot.description: Code slot to set the code.
code_slot.name: Code slot

set_lock_usercode.name: Set lock user code

command_class.description: The ID of the command class for the value.
command_class.name: Command class

property.description: The ID of the property for the value.
property.name: Property

property_key.description: The ID of the property key for the value.
property_key.name: Property key
